title: Do AWS’s Dedicated Local Zones Align with the Demands of Digital Sovereignty?
description: In a significant move to address the growing demands of digital sovereignty, Amazon Web Services (AWS) has unveiled Dedicated Local Zones, a specialized offering designed to empower public sector and regulated industry customers with the ability to isolate sensitive workloads. This latest addition to AWS’s extensive portfolio enables customers to exercise precise control over their ... Read more

title: Coinbase’s Base blockchain hits new remarkable milestone
description: Coinbase’s layer 2 blockchain, Base, has been making waves in the cryptocurrency world since its launch in early August. Recent data from IntoTheBlock reveals that the blockchain has reached an all-time high in daily transactions, with 1.88 million transactions on a single day, surpassing its layer 2 rivals Arbitrum and Optimism combined, which recorded 780,000 ... Read more

title: Binance CEO clarifies ongoing rumors about the exchange
description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ) has addressed speculation surrounding the departure of Binance.US CEO Brian Shroder, emphasizing that Shroder is simply taking a well-deserved break following a successful tenure with the company. Binance.US, a subsidiary of Binance Holdings, has witnessed several high-level executive departures recently amidst legal challenges from both the U.S. Securities and Exchange ... Read more

title: BTC Breaking Above $28K Will Signal Full Bull Says Analyst
description:
In an X post today, CrediBULL Crypto warned that BTC’s price may drop in the short term. This bearish thesis will be invalidated if BTC breaks above $28K, added the cryptocurrency analyst. BTC’s price broke out of a bullish chart pattern over the past 24 hours and may overcome the resistance at $26,917.47 soon. According […]

The post BTC Breaking Above $28K Will Signal Full Bull Says Analyst appeared first on Coin Edition.
